summary: A disgraced former air traffic controller is called back into service when the airport's traffic control system malfunctions.
cast: Kiefer Sutherland|Bruce McGill|Kristy Swanson|Robert Sean Leonard|Kelly McGillis|Margaret Cho|Ruben Paul|Charles Fleischer|Henry Winkler|Farrah Forke|Michael Gross|Vito D'Ambrosio|Jack Plotnick|Mike Kimmel|Brian George|Wendi Westbrook|John Bennett Perry|Eleanor Mondale|Karl Bury|Alex Wexo|John Nielsen|Drew Snyder|Steve Sax|Jonathan Fraser|Maria Aparis|Blake Lindsley|Jill Hughes
title: Ground Control
